txt.en: 'There is no sense in delaying this, [placeholder]. It is time that we were free of this place. Speak with me when you are ready.'
'I carried you... this far... but this is... the end... for Baldgar son of Beldgar.'
'Are you ready? We will only get one chance at this. We must make it count!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is a solo quest and cannot be completed with a fellowship.</rgb>

'Is this... the end? Where is the reminder... of our captivity?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>You need to have the Reminder of Captivity item in your inventory to advance this quest. If it is currently in your Vault, you will need to remove it and bring it to Baldgar to advance.</rgb>
The time has come to carry out Baldgar's escape plan. If all goes well, you will soon be free of Isengard.
Talk to Baldgar and carry out the escape plan
Baldgar is in the dungeons below Isengard.
Talk to Baldgar in the Gravenwood
When you awaken, you find that you have been carried to the Gravenwood, but Baldgar is near death.
